<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Returns a pair with first element representing whether basic block sections</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// profile exist for the function \\p FuncName, and the second element</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// representing the basic block sections profile (cluster info) for this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function. If the first element is true and the second element is empty, it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// means unique basic block sections are desired for all basic blocks of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;bool, SmallVector&lt;BBClusterInfo&gt;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This contains the BB cluster information for the whole program.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For every function name, it contains the cloning and cluster information</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for (all or some of) its basic blocks. The cluster information for every</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// basic block includes its cluster ID along with the position of the basic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
